name: Umi (Anime)
text: All Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Machine and Pyro monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF. Both players can change face-down Defense Position WATER monsters they control to face-up Attack Position when attacked. During their Main Phase, the turn player can change WATER monsters they control to face-down Defense Position. If "Full Moon" or "Mystical Moon" is on the field, your opponent can only control 1 non-WATER monster. If a "Full Moon" or "Mystical Moon" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. If this card leaves the field, flip all monsters you control face-up.
